DOC.brief_summary: Fish aquaculture sector constitute increase part fish consumption Denmark . The important farm fish Denmark rainbow trout . Due limit access wild fish feed production , alternative feeding regime vegetable origin vegetable protein rapeseed oil use instead marine feed . This change feed regime may affect flesh quality health nutritional property content long-chain n-3 polyunsaturated fatty acid ( n-3 LCPUFA ) presumably decrease meat . The objective study investigate effect vegetable base feed versus marine feed farm trout effect healthy men cardiovascular risk marker associate development cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Trout Fed With Vegetable Based Feed Cardiovascular Risk Markers Plasma Proteome
DOC.detailed_description: In two month parallel study include 60 healthy men age 40-70 year , cardiovascular effect one daily meal trout feed vegetable base feed compare trout fed marine feed ( estimate intake n-3 LCPUFA 2.6 g/day ) standard Danish diet poultry . Men randomise one three group . Red blood cell fatty acid composition , classical cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) -risk marker ( blood pressure plasma lipid profile ) , new CVD-markers ( arterial compliance plasma marker endothelial function inflammation ) plasma proteome analysis measure begin end intervention period .
DOC.criteria: Age 4070 Body mass index 18,5 30 Exercise > 10 h/week Chronical disease ( eg . cardiovascular diabetes ) Regular medication Fish oil supplementation Blood donation 2 month prior participation Above maximum recommend alcohol intake Blood pressure > 160/100 mm Hg
